___excludes.markdownDescription:
regular expressions matching files to exclude from formatting
default is to exclude any `.haxelib`, `.git` and `node_modules` folder

___disableFormatting.markdownDescription:
turns off formatting for all files in current folder and subfolders
unless subfolder contains a `hxformat.json`

___beginType.markdownDescription: add empty lines after opening "{" of type

___endType.markdownDescription: add empty lines before closing "}" of type

___returnBodySingleLine.markdownDescription:
same line policy for single line expression return values
* same = place return and body on same line
* next = place body on next line
* keep = keep same / next line from source

___functionBody.markdownDescription:
same line policy for non block body of "function"
* same = place function and body on same line
* next = place body on next line
* keep = keep same / next line from source

___returnBody.markdownDescription:
same line policy for multiline expression return values
* same = place return and body on same line
* next = place body on next line
* keep = keep same / next line from source

___doWhileBody.markdownDescription:
same line policy for non block body of "do…while"
* same = place function and body on same line
* next = place body on next line
* keep = keep same / next line from source

___ifElse.markdownDescription:
same line policy for "else" part of "if…else"
* same = place else and body on same line
* next = place body on next line
* keep = keep same / next line from source

___untypedBody.markdownDescription:
same line policy for untyped {…} as a body
* same = place return and body on same line
* next = place body on next line
* keep = keep same / next line from source

___tryBody.markdownDescription:
same line policy for non block body of "try"
* same = place try and body on same line
* next = place body on next line
* keep = keep same / next line from source

___expressionIfWithBlocks.markdownDescription:
will place if with one expression in a block in one line (requires "expressionIf" = "same")
var foo = if (bar) { ""; } else { ""; };

___whileBody.markdownDescription:
same line policy for non block body of "while" (not "do…while")
* same = place while and body on same line
* next = place body on next line
* keep = keep same / next line from source

___forBody.markdownDescription:
same line policy for non block body of "for"
* same = place function and body on same line
* next = place body on next line
* keep = keep same / next line from source

___doWhile.markdownDescription:
same line policy for "while" part in "do…while"
* same = place while and body on same line
* next = place body on next line
* keep = keep same / next line from source

___catchBody.markdownDescription:
same line policy for non block body of "catch"
* same = place catch and body on same line
* next = place body on next line
* keep = keep same / next line from source

___expressionIf.markdownDescription:
same line policy for non block body of "if" in a value place / as expression
* same = place if and body on same line
* next = place body on next line
* keep = keep same / next line from source

___ifBody.markdownDescription:
same line policy for non block body of "if"
* same = place if and body on same line
* next = place body on next line
* keep = keep same / next line from source

___elseBody.markdownDescription:
same line policy for non block body of "else"
* same = place else and body on same line
* next = place body on next line
* keep = keep same / next line from source

___anonFunctionBody.markdownDescription:
same line policy for non block body of anon "function"
* same = place function and body on same line
* next = place body on next line
* keep = keep same / next line from source

___elseIf.markdownDescription:
same line policy for "if" part of "else if"
* same = place if and body on same line
* next = place body on next line
* keep = keep same / next line from source

___tryCatch.markdownDescription:
same line policy for "catch" part of "try…catch"
* same = place function and body on same line
* next = place body on next line
* keep = keep same / next line from source

___betweenImportsLevel.markdownDescription:
restrict betweenImports setting to a specific level
"all" - apply betweenImports to all imports/using entries
"topLevelPackage" - group imports/using entries using toplevel package names; no empty lines for identical toplevel names
"packages" - group imports/using entries using full packages; no empty lines for identical package names

___beforeType.markdownDescription: empty lines after import and using section

___betweenImports.markdownDescription: empty lines between two consecutive import/using lines using betweenImportsLevel

___beforeUsing.markdownDescription: empty lines between import and using lines

___maxLineLength.markdownDescription: maximum characters per line, formatter will try to wrap code longer than `maxLineLength`

___multiVar.markdownDescription: chain wrapping rules for OpAdd / OpSub

___opAddSubChain.markdownDescription: chain wrapping rules for OpAdd / OpSub

___arrayWrap.markdownDescription:
array wrapping rules
does not affect array comprehension, use "sameLine.comprehensionFor"

___arrayMatrixWrap.markdownDescription:
detect arrays in matrix configuration from source
noMatrixWrap = no detection
matrixWrapNoAlign = detect and format as matrix without alignment
matrixWrapWithAlign = detect and format as matrix and align columns

___compressSuccessiveParenthesis.markdownDescription: should formatter compress spaces for successive parenthesis `( [ {` vs. `([{`

___formatStringInterpolation.markdownDescription:
should formatter try to format string interpolation expressions (e.g. '${x+3}' -> '${x + 3}')
only applies spaces, no newlines or wrapping

___excludes.markdownDescription:
regular expressions matching files to exclude from formatting
default is to exclude any `.haxelib`, `.git` and `node_modules` folder

___disableFormatting.markdownDescription:
turns off formatting for all files in current folder and subfolders
unless subfolder contains a `hxformat.json`

___beforeDocCommentEmptyLines.markdownDescription:
"one" adds one empty line above doc comments
"none" removes all empty lines above doc comments
"ignore" respects empty lines set via "betweenVars", "betweenFunctions", etc.

___betweenSingleLineTypes.markdownDescription: empty lines between two single line types

___beforeRightCurly.markdownDescription: Remove or keep empty lines above "}"

___betweenMultilineComments.markdownDescription: Adds empty lines between two consecutive multiline comments

___lineCommentsBetweenTypes.markdownDescription: empty lines for line comments between types

___afterFieldsWithDocComments.markdownDescription:
"one" adds one empty line after fields with doc comments
"none" removes all empty lines line fields with doc comments
"ignore" respects empty lines set via "betweenVars", "betweenFunctions", etc.

___afterReturn.markdownDescription: Remove or keep empty lines below "return"

___importAndUsing.markdownDescription: empty lines for package, import and using section

___lineCommentsBetweenFunctions.markdownDescription: empty lines for line comments between functions

___maxAnywhereInFile.markdownDescription: maximum consecutive empty lines anywhere in file - runs last, all empty lines policies are limited to "maxAnywhereInFile"

___afterLeftCurly.markdownDescription: Remove or keep empty lines below "{"

___afterFileHeaderComment.markdownDescription: Adds empty lines when file starts with a multiline comment

___emptyCurly.markdownDescription: global empty curlies line end setting

___anonTypeCurly.markdownDescription: line end settings for anon type curlies

___objectLiteralCurly.markdownDescription: line end settings for object literal curlies

___blockCurly.markdownDescription: line end settings for block curlies

___leftCurly.markdownDescription: global left curly line end setting

___typedefCurly.markdownDescription: line end settings for typedef curlies

___rightCurly.markdownDescription: global right curly line end setting

___trailingWhitespace.markdownDescription: adds trailing whitespace to empty lines by copying indentation from preceeding line

___conditionalPolicy.markdownDescription:
only applies to non inlined conditionals
"fixedZero" = all conditional statements should start in column 1
"fixedZeroIncrease" = indentation for conditionals starts at 0 and increases for every level
"fixedZeroIncreaseBlocks" = same as "fixedZeroIncrease" but increases only inside blocks, outside it's "fixedZero"
"aligned" = conditional statements share indentation of surrounding code
"alignedNestedIncrease" = conditionals align with surrounding code, but will increase indent when nested
"alignedIncrease" = same as "aligned" but will increase indent by +1 for enclosed code
"alignedDecrease" = same as "aligned" but will decrease indent by -1 for enclosed code

___character.markdownDescription: use "tab", " ", "  ", "   ", "    ", etc. to define which character to use

___indentCaseLabels.markdownDescription: indent case / default labels (true) or keep them on same level as switch (false)

___tabWidth.markdownDescription: if `character` is set to "tab", formatter uses `tabWidth` to calculate absolute line length

___emptyCurly.markdownDescription: global empty curlies line end setting

___anonTypeCurly.markdownDescription: line end settings for anon type curlies

___leftCurly.markdownDescription: line end options for left curly

___emptyCurly.markdownDescription: line end options for empty curlies

___rightCurly.markdownDescription: line end options for right curly

___leftCurly.markdownDescription: line end options for left curly

___rightCurly.markdownDescription: line end options for right curly

___emptyCurly.markdownDescription: line end options for empty curlies

___rightCurly.markdownDescription: line end options for right curly

___typedefCurly.markdownDescription: line end settings for typedef curlies

___leftCurly.markdownDescription: line end options for left curly

___emptyCurly.markdownDescription: line end options for empty curlies

___rightCurly.markdownDescription: line end options for right curly
global right curly line end setting

___anonFuncParamParens.markdownDescription: parens used for anon function parameters

___endType.markdownDescription: add empty lines before closing "}" of type

___location.markdownDescription: default wrapping location before / after last token

___conditions.markdownDescription:
list of conditions
wrapping selects a rule if all of its conditions evaluate to true

___additionalIndent.markdownDescription: adds indentation to all wrapped lines
